snippet: Marlene Pinnock said she thought she was going to die as a California Highway Patrol officer straddled her, repeatedly punching her head on the side of a Los Angeles freeway....

headline.print_headline: APNewsBreak: LA Woman Punched by Patrolman Speaks
headline.main: APNewsBreak: LA Woman Punched by Patrolman Speaks

lead_paragraph: Marlene Pinnock said she thought she was going to die as a California Highway Patrol officer straddled her, repeatedly punching her head on the side of a Los Angeles freeway.
